title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Applying Universal Design to Enhance Online Learning Inclusivity

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply three universal design principles for diverse learners to online content.
Learners can identify two accessibility barriers in LMS-based science instruction and propose solutions.
Learners can create project-based assessment materials following universal design guidelines.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
